multiple_choice.description: Select the best answer for each question

questions.question: In what year was Saudi Arabia founded?
questions.explanation: Saudi Arabia was officially founded on September 23, 1932

questions.question: Who is known as the founder of Saudi Arabia?
questions.explanation: King Abdulaziz Al Saud unified the kingdoms and founded the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia

questions.question: What is the national color of Saudi Arabia?
questions.explanation: The Saudi flag is predominantly green with a white stripe and the Shahada in white

questions.question: Which month and day is Saudi National Day celebrated?
questions.explanation: Saudi National Day is celebrated on September 23rd each year

questions.question: What is the capital of Saudi Arabia?
questions.explanation: Riyadh is the capital and largest city of Saudi Arabia

true_false.description: Answer True or False for each statement

questions.statement: Saudi Arabia is the largest oil producer in the world.
questions.explanation: Saudi Arabia has the world's second-largest proven oil reserves and is the largest oil exporter

questions.statement: The Saudi flag features the Islamic Declaration of Faith (Shahada).
questions.explanation: The white Shahada is prominently displayed on the Saudi flag

questions.statement: Mecca is located in Saudi Arabia.
questions.explanation: Mecca is in western Saudi Arabia and is the holiest city in Islam

questions.statement: Saudi Arabia's national sport is football (soccer).
questions.explanation: While football is popular, the official national sport is camel racing

questions.statement: The Arabian Peninsula is entirely located within Saudi Arabia.
questions.explanation: The Arabian Peninsula is shared by multiple countries including UAE, Yemen, Oman, and others

questions.statement: King Abdulaziz Al Saud united the Arabian Peninsula into one kingdom.
questions.explanation: He successfully unified various regions and kingdoms into Saudi Arabia

questions.statement: Saudi Arabia is a member of the Gulf Cooperation Council (GCC).
questions.explanation: Saudi Arabia is one of the founding members of the GCC

questions.statement: The Riyadh is located on the Red Sea coast.
questions.explanation: Riyadh is located in the interior/central region of Saudi Arabia, not on the coast

questions.statement: Arabic is the official language of Saudi Arabia.
questions.explanation: Modern Standard Arabic is the official language of Saudi Arabia

questions.statement: The Saudi National Day marks the unification of the Saudi kingdoms.
questions.explanation: September 23 commemorates the founding of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia in 1932
